title: Founder TV Roundup: ‘The Dropout,’ ‘WeCrashed,’ and ‘Super Pumped’
description:
Chris and Joanna team up to discuss the sudden boom in shows focused on startups. They compare and contrast ‘The Dropout,’ ‘WeCrashed,’ and ‘Super Pumped’ and then rank which shows they’re enjoying the most. Plus, they discuss the performances and episodes that stood out and reflect on the impact that ‘The Social Network’ had on these shows.
Hosts: Chris Ryan and Joanna Robinson
Associate Producers: Mike Wargon
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
